hero.title: Create Professional Quizzes with Simple Operations
hero.description: ExamForge is an all-in-one platform that allows educational institutions and corporate trainers to easily create, distribute, and manage high-quality quizzes and exams.

benefits.freeQuizzes: Create up to 5 quizzes for free

features.title: Create Professional Exams with Simple Operations
features.description: With ExamForge's versatile features, you can efficiently create, manage, and analyze all types of quizzes and exams.

builder.title: Intuitive Quiz Builder
builder.description: Easily create and rearrange questions with drag & drop. Anyone can use it without programming knowledge.

questionTypes.title: Diverse Question Types
questionTypes.description: Supports various question formats such as true/false, single choice, multiple choice, and free text. Pro plan offers even more advanced question types.

analytics.title: Detailed Analysis Reports
analytics.description: Visually confirm test-takers' scores and correct answer rates for each question. Provides insights to maximize learning effectiveness.

scoring.title: Automatic Scoring System
scoring.description: Immediately check results with automatic scoring for selection and specified answers. Manual grading mode also allows for more flexible evaluation.

import.title: Excel/CSV Integration
import.description: Bulk import existing questions from Excel or CSV. Efficiently register large volumes of questions. (Pro plan)

certificates.title: Certificate Issuance
certificates.description: Automatically generate customizable certificates for download as PDF or auto-send to test-takers. (Pro plan)

security.title: Security Measures
security.description: Securely manage important exam content with password protection and access restriction features.

feedback.title: Feedback System
feedback.description: Support learners' comprehension with explanations for each question and comment functions during grading.

cta.title: Create Professional Quizzes Now
cta.description: With ExamForge's user-friendly interface, you can create and distribute quizzes and exams in minutes. Try it with our free plan.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing Plans
pricing.description: Choose from three plans to suit your needs. Upgrade as you grow.

free.name: Free Plan
free.description: Perfect for individuals and small teams

pro.name: Pro Plan
pro.description: Perfect for educational institutions and businesses

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations and educational institutions

pricing.guarantee: All plans come with a 30-day money-back guarantee. Contact us if you have any questions.
